summary: Complete Smithing Overhaul. Adding new recipes, perks and materials.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=24]Information[/size][/b]
[b]The goal[/b]
The goal of this mod is to improve the smithing experience by adding more recipes, materials and perks. Another goal is to fix armor set bonusses, various recipes and other bonusses.
I also plan on making it more rewarding and adding a few quests in the future.
For the changed recipes see the changelog.

[b]Installation[/b]
- Download and activate with NMM.
- I did some testing and loading order does not matter.

[b]Questions[/b]
[u]Wow thats a lot of perks, how am i going to get all of them?[/u]
I have added smithing tomes that teach you some perks, i will also add quests that give you tomes or perks.
You can use the console command `player.addperk [b]x[/b]` replace [b]x[/b] with any of the perk codes. You can find the perk codes by entering this console command `help \" smithing\" 4`.

[b]Requests[/b]
If the request sounds good and improves my mod i will definitely add it and i will credit you for your contribution.

[b]Annoyances[/b]
Skyrim does not allow editing the categories in the smithing menu, therefor i cannot add SILVER etc. categories to the smithing menu, you can find them in other categories.

[b]ToDo[/b]
Add more quests.
Add Mithril armors/weapons
Add Ethereal armors/weapons
I need a modder who is willing to let me use files...

[b]Recommended mods[/b]
I dont know any yet.

[b]Compatible mods[/b]
About anything.

[b]Semi-compatible mods[/b]
Anything that edits recipes or perks. Be sure to get the correct loading order.

[b]Incompatible mods[/b]
Let me know.

[b]Special Thanks[/b]
n1t0r for helping me with the tomes (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3383372).
author: Camulus
